amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any funds from being used to challenge a State law on the grounds that it is inconsistent with NAFTA or the Uruguay Round Agreements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 49 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit any funds to be used for the filing of a complaint in any legal action brought under specified sections of the NAFTA Implementation Act or the Uruguay Round Agreements Act.

action.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 228 (Roll No. 401).
